about_the_game:
• Lost Soul is an action game focusing on bullet-hell gameplay and storyline based on philosophical reflections, the afterlife and the fight of good and evil, order and chaos.
  • The game includes several varied levels spread throughout the afterlife, and the gameplay itself requires dexterity and timing from the player. You'll be forced to make many decisions, each one will bring different results, from the gain of power to remorse.
  • The controls are simple and easy to understand, after a few moments it will hold no secrets from you.
  • The gameplay includes different skills during your playthrough, which provide variety of particular experiences every single time.



In the game you will play as Edenus. Once the guardian of the Paradise Garden, who after thousand of years still remains loyal to THE LORD, unlike some of his brethren. Your mission it to retreat The Soul, but this is no ordinary soul, THE LORD himself ordered you to reclaim it. Lost Soul offers incredible soundtrack, which perfectly fits in the gameplay and blends with the rest of graphical design.

short_description: Nothing can stop the inevitable. Everything will play out, just as it has been planned. Forced Sacrifice: Lost Souls is a bullet-hell game with a storyline reaching for metaphysical and theological topics. Gather the power, get rid of demons and retake The Soul from the traitors.
